about_the_game:
Out of Sight is a fast-paced action-packed stealth game where you use tactics to outsmart an alien space cult, all while solving intricate puzzles to secure your escape and the freedom of your fellow crewmates.

Your mission is clear: escape to survive. Whether you prefer going solo or teaming up with a friend in local co-op mode, you'll take control of various gadgets and abilities to enhance your chance of survival. Prepare for unpredictable challenges as the dynamic enemy AI keeps each playthrough fresh, including intense boss battles that test your mastery of abilities.

Out of Sight provides a throwback to classic stealth games, making it a great option for fans of retro-style gameplay.
For parents looking for a non-violent and fun co-op experience to play with their kids, Out of Sight offers the option to team up and play couch co-op.
